Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

i've been around for a while now, checking for mods and stuff almost every day. As you can see here, i played this game a lot:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36000-333-hours-of-KSP

Now i would like to change the title to "500-hours-of-scratching-the-ram-limit" and finally use my own avatar. As I understand it, my account has to be unlocked for this?

anyway,

happy crash...doing awesome stuff in space!

ratata

Edited January 6, 2014 by Ratata
all you need is more than 4/5 posts
lol...a friend told me, it had to be unlocked by an admin???
Here's an imgur album with detailed instructions. Might help, might not but here it is.
thank you! how do i change the thread title? didn't find it in thread tools?
Thank you all for your quick help, all my questions were answered in a helpful and friendly manner. three cheers to the KSP community!
No matter how long you've been before, welcome here right this very moment.
